# Select and make an averaged trace from a data frame.

```{r}

Bl_Avg <- avgSweeps(field$ABF, obs = "PreC-Bl")%>% 
    bl_adjust(.) %>%
    slice(., stimArtifact(.):length(.))
Decay_Avg <- avgSweeps(field$ABF, obs = "Decay") %>% bl_adjust(.)
Cond_Avg <- avgSweeps(field$ABF, obs = "Cond") %>% bl_adjust(.)



traces = data.frame(Bl_Avg,Decay_Avg,Cond_Avg)

```


# Identify the location of the stim artifact. 
```{r}
stim <- stimArtifact(Bl_Avg)
```
